Home.heroDesc: Affordable tenant insurance with fast claims, flexible coverage, and great support. Get a personalized quote in minutes.
Home.whyDesc: Simple coverage for renters and tenants.

flexible.title: Flexible plans
flexible.desc: Choose coverage levels that fit your life.

fast.title: Fast claims
fast.desc: File online and track your claim status.

support.title: Trusted support
support.desc: Talk to licensed agents when you need help.

bundle.title: Bundle & save
bundle.desc: Discounts when you add additional products.

Plans.title: Plans
Plans.desc: Choose the plan that fits your needs. You can adjust limits later.

Products.title: Products
Products.desc: Coverage options tailored for renters and property owners.

renters.name: Renters Insurance
renters.desc: Protect personal property and liability at your rental.

landlord.name: Landlord Insurance
landlord.desc: Basic dwelling coverage for rental property owners.

liability.name: Personal Liability
liability.desc: Extra liability coverage for peace of mind.

Support.title: Support
Support.desc: Get help with claims, policies, and account questions.

fileClaim.title: File a Claim
fileClaim.desc: Start a new claim online in minutes.

faq.title: FAQs
faq.desc: Answers to common questions about coverage and billing.

agents.title: Find an Agent
agents.desc: Locate phone numbers and addresses for local offices.

contact.title: Contact Support
contact.desc: Email or message our team for help.

items.a: Personal property (your stuff), personal liability, and additional living expenses if your home becomes uninhabitable due to a covered loss.
Sudden and accidental water damage is typically covered. Floods usually require separate coverage.
Yes. You can cancel your policy at any time with no fees.

Claims.title: File a Claim
Claims.desc: We're here to help 24/7. Submit your details and an agent will reach out.
Claims.thanksDesc: Your claim number is {id}. An adjuster will contact you shortly.

details.title: Claim Details
details.desc: Tell us what happened and how to reach you.

Track.title: Track a Claim
Track.desc: Enter your claim number to see the current status.
Track.progressDesc: Where your claim is in the process.

Agents.title: Find an Agent
Agents.desc: Call or visit a local office for personalized help.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.desc: Questions about coverage, billing, or claims? We're happy to help.

Legal.privacyBody: This is a demo site for an insurance company. Replace this page with your organization's actual privacy policy.

Legal.disclosuresBody: Acme Insurance is a fictitious brand for demo purposes. Replace with your compliance and licensing details, including NAIC numbers, producer licenses, and state-specific disclosures.
